fields.value: Replication Data for: Politicization and Expertise: Exit, Effort, and Investment

dsDescriptionValue.value: This dataset includes code to replicate the analysis in the main text and the online appendix. The data used in this article must remain confidential to protect the anonymity of respondents as required by the Institutional Review Boards that approved the project. The categorization of federal agencies by mission is included.

keywordValue.value: political appointees; policy expertise; civil service; presidents; turnover
